credential_stacks.name: DAN Pathway (EQF 4)
credential_stacks.description: Learning pathway for DAN role at EQF level 4

credential_stacks.name: DAN Pathway (EQF 5)
credential_stacks.description: Learning pathway for DAN role at EQF level 5

credential_stacks.name: DAN Pathway (EQF 6)
credential_stacks.description: Learning pathway for DAN role at EQF level 6

credentials.name: Work-based Sustainability Project
credentials.description: Apply sustainability knowledge in real-world workplace settings
learning_outcomes: Recognize organizational contexts for sustainability project implementation.
Explain sustainability project management methodologies in workplace settings.
Execute a sustainability initiative in a real-world professional environment.

credential_stacks.name: DAN Pathway (EQF 7)
credential_stacks.description: Learning pathway for DAN role at EQF level 7

credentials.name: Industry Collaboration Project
credentials.description: Collaborative sustainability project with industry partners
learning_outcomes: Identify effective approaches for industry-academic collaboration on sustainability.
Analyze stakeholder needs in cross-sector sustainability projects.
Execute collaborative sustainability initiatives with industry partners.

credential_stacks.name: DAN Pathway (EQF 8)
credential_stacks.description: Learning pathway for DAN role at EQF level 8

competencies_covered.name: Competency in Strategic Digital Sustainability Leadership

credentials.name: Strategic Digital Sustainability Leadership
credentials.description: Advanced work-based module on leading sustainability transitions using digital tools
learning_outcomes: Synthesize frameworks for strategic leadership in digital sustainability at the executive level.
Critically evaluate approaches to integrating ESG, digital tools, and organizational change practices.
Lead complex cross-functional sustainability initiatives using advanced digital technologies.

competencies.name: Competency in Strategic Digital Sustainability Leadership
